title: Eiffel Tower, Paris
description: The iconic iron tower in Paris, offering breathtaking views of the city and a symbol of romance.

title: Great Wall of China
description: An ancient world wonder stretching across mountains and valleys, reflecting China's rich history.

title: Taj Mahal, India
description: A magnificent white marble mausoleum built as a symbol of love and one of the Seven Wonders.

title: Statue of Liberty, New York
description: A global symbol of freedom standing proudly in New York Harbor, welcoming visitors from around the world.

title: Santorini, Greece
description: Famous for its whitewashed buildings, blue domes, and stunning sunsets over the Aegean Sea.

title: Machu Picchu, Peru
description: An ancient Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains, surrounded by mist and mystery.

title: Sydney Opera House, Australia
description: A world-famous architectural landmark located on Sydney Harbour with a distinctive sail-like design.

title: Dubai Skyline, UAE
description: A futuristic skyline featuring the Burj Khalifa and luxury architecture in the heart of the desert.

title: Niagara Falls, Canada
description: A powerful and awe-inspiring waterfall attracting millions of visitors every year.
